review: Very easy set up. I purchased it to use on my boat house and it works like a dream. Most Cable companies provide an app if you have internet with them and it gives you a hot spot to use at no cost. Beware if you use your cell phone providers hot spot it will eat your data in two movies. I love that I can take it anywhere I go.
author: Tim Silvers

review: Seems like we keep having problems after problems. I don't want delays. I don't want to keep troubleshooting. Roku customer is way better and the product is to. I had a Roku for years and something broke they still sent a replacement even after warranty was up. My stick is still under warranty and I have to jump through hoops to try and get it fixed.
